website_summaries.verdict: Excellent set by a brand that's been known for outstanding quality since 1925. Well worth the investment for cooks who want premium cookware.
pros: Superior quality thanks in part to the 3-ply stainless steel construction that heats and cooks evenly and is made to withstand high temperatures
Set includes five useful pieces with rugged handles
cons: Comes at a high price, but the cost of this well-made cookware will pay off in the long run
Handles get hot to the touch

customer_reviews.title: Lovely
customer_reviews.text: I’ve always wanted Le Creuset but I don’t like cast iron. I was delighted to find they do stainless steel too. Easy to clean, great on my induction hob, so long as you make sure to put them on a ring that matches the pan size. Heavy and substantial, you can feel the quality. Make sure to use pot holders though, those handles get mighty hot!
customer_reviews.author: Merita King

customer_reviews.title: Considered purchase but quality is outstanding
customer_reviews.text: A considered purchase but well worth it quality is outstanding, purchased with two multi steamer inserts.
customer_reviews.author: s e crow

customer_reviews.title: Great pans but terrible frying pan
customer_reviews.text: The stainless steel pans are excellent in both quality, heat distribution and weight. I cannot fault them. I would give the pans five stars. However the frying pan lets the whole set down. The frying pan is covered with a non stick covering which six months in with careful use but cleaned in a dishwasher started to peel off. 18 months later it is crumbling off and I am scared to use it. For the price and reputation of le cruset I would not expect this. I had skk pans before ( for 13 years I had no issue with these pans) but had to change because I got an induction hob.
customer_reviews.author: Shopaholic

customer_reviews.title: Great pans!
customer_reviews.text: Wow these pans are amazingly high quality and I love how solid the lids and handles are! Really got a deal with Amazon of offer for £299!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Aj Phillipo

customer_reviews.title: Strong, Sturdy, Heavy & Lifelong (But Expensive!)
customer_reviews.text: I can see these steel pans lasting a lifetime. They are tough in my relentless kitchen. Can be scoured gently with a pad, which I have to do with my multi-cuisine cooking. I am in the process of slowly replacing all my pans for Le Creuset as there is nothing on the market that offers the same level of resilience. They're uber expensive though so it might take some time to be rid of all the other brands!
customer_reviews.author: Wilde's Cabbage

customer_reviews.title: Le Creuset 3-Ply Stainless Steel Saucepan Set
customer_reviews.text: Takes a bit of getting used to, especially as heat ranges need to be more tightly controlled. They're also fairly heavy. The only thing I'd change is the lids to tempered glass, and a way to half-way cover the pot with the lids - they have a tendency to slip back into place. The size/structure is spot on though, they heat evenly and fast, and the design of the rim allows you to pour without anything dripping.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant product and service
customer_reviews.text: A little marking in the pot when I first used on of the pots on a low heat which freaked me out a bit but it's ok now. Lovely pots, arrived very quickly but the box was a little damaged on the outside, on investigation as they had been packaged so well there was no damage to the contents. Cannot fault these pots at all. Always wanted a set and now I have and they the best.
customer_reviews.author: GG

customer_reviews.title: Top quality and worth the investment
customer_reviews.text: Washing by hand as read in the small print it’s best to do this for longevity rather than a dish washer. No problems so far but easy to clean Abit heavy took me abit of time to get used to the weight, on a positive you can really feel the build quality My previous plans had glass lids, these are solid and no steam hole so again took some getting used to The inside of each pan has a measuring detail which is a nice feature
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: Not as fantastic as they think they are
customer_reviews.text: Lovely saucepans, cook food really well and with lids on you can turn the heat down really low helping to save energy. I have been really careful with these pans especially the non stick milk pan I bought separately, only washing this by hand. The exterior of the pans are brushed stainless steel and I noticed the other day there were scratches on one of them. I thought they'd be far more robust than that for the very expensive price tag they command. They are after all intended for some heavy kitchen useage and not pieces of fine china. Would I buy them again? Probably not
customer_reviews.author: Lisa J. Mortimer

customer_reviews.title: I also disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I really appreciate a good quality sauce pan, and have long been a huge fan of the Le Crueset enamel pans, but for the type of cooking i do (pasta, scrambled eggs, etc) these pans are just not right. Everything sticks and they are really hard to clean. I wish I had been given more advice as I would have brought the non-stick version, which makes me think why does the stainless steel version exist as all.
customer_reviews.author: Fiona

customer_reviews.title: HIgh quality pans
customer_reviews.text: The additional handle is great - I have arthritis in my wrists and have trouble holding and emptying pans - not with these! Heavy duty saucepans which really hold the heat well and cook evenly - prefer them to the Cast Iron Le Creuset pans which these have replaced.
customer_reviews.author: J J.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Love these pots.Sorry I ever wasted my money buying and replacing previous brands.Yes, they are expensive but,if you buy them when they're on offer(every couple of months)they're worth it.Heat transfer is great and they're very easy to clean. This set is for a friend's house warming,I've already put the set i own to the test over the last 2 years and, they still clean up to look like new.Definitely built to last.
customer_reviews.author: Helen C.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic quality
customer_reviews.text: These sauspans are great. The measuring guide inside is really useful and the handles don't get too hot like other sauspans can.
customer_reviews.author: Claire W.

customer_reviews.title: I was worried about the weight but they are NOT like the usual cast iron pans from Le Creuset but ...
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with these. I was worried about the weight but they are NOT like the usual cast iron pans from Le Creuset but they are built as well. A bit heavier than your normal stainless steel pan, the useful handle helps you lift the pan. They all go perfectly in the dishwasher too. I have a Rangemaster Induction hob and these work well, with their thicker steel bottom. I've waited all my life for a set of decent pans and I'm so pleased with these ones, I recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Orchidhouse Bengals

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Couple of months use and thoroughly impressed. Feel they will serve for a considerably longer time than the non stick counter parts.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great pans
customer_reviews.text: Good heavy pan, can have it on low and still have it boiling. Simply wipe with cloth to ckean or for stubborn a stainless steel scouring ball .
customer_reviews.author: allsop

customer_reviews.title: Awesome birthday gift
customer_reviews.text: The pots look great, they are super fast in the induction stove, they have measurements on the inside (metric and imperial), and deglazing them is easy. If you're looking an affordable and quality 3-ply set of pots, look no further. Yes, it's true that Le Creuset is better known for their cast-iron pots, but these ones look beautiful and work great. They're not too heavy but having two handles really helps. ... and you can thrown them in the dish-washing machine!
customer_reviews.author: Pedro Ramalhete

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Quality is just perfect! They do not require high heat. The food is cooked to perfection. I'm very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with the product, even more pleased with the service from Le Creuset.  Bought more.
customer_reviews.text: Wife loves them. They are good and when the pan had problems, Le Creuset were more than helpful in replacing it when they did not need to as pan was not under life time warrenty. Very pleased with the product, even more pleased with the service from Le Creuset. Have already advised familly members to buy their products, particularly this one.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Narendra Thacker

customer_reviews.title: Best pans you will buy
customer_reviews.text: As you would expect this is a very well made product and you can feel it when you use them
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The cheapest 5 pan Le crueset offer you will find
customer_reviews.text: We bought these to use once our grown up children have left home. So are not using them at present. They look and feel absolute quality and we just couldn't believe the price. We had been looking for a while and had seen the 3 pan set for around £300 but only in the sales.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Feel the Quality
customer_reviews.text: The design is very sturdy, however I didn't expect the 3-ply design to be so heavy - upgrading from basic stainless steel disc pans.
customer_reviews.author: Xpert Man

customer_reviews.title: Best in show!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely superb saucepans, get what you pay for. Highly recommend if your looking for lasting quality.. and they look fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Blackwell

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and even cooking
customer_reviews.text: Love my new pans. They’re not too heavy but feel really solid. The low heat cooking works very well if you follow instructions and leave the lid on.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra Hayhoe

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love these pans
customer_reviews.text: Had these for about 5 months now. Absolutely love these pans. The frying pan has kept it's shape and the non stick material is not flaking or anything and this is after some robust use. The pans have kept their shape too and if I cook something sticky in them just give them a soak and then they wipe clean easily. They are a little pricey but I suspect these will be in my kitchen for a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Incredible quality & weight
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality pans, very sturdy and quick to heat up, I purposely purchased the stainless pots/pans over the non stick as I know they’ll last a life time, but cleaning really isn’t the easiest!
customer_reviews.author: WILLIAM DURSTON

customer_reviews.title: The best pans you can buy
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a set to use with my new induction hob. Not cheap, but they are the best
customer_reviews.author: Richard Meredith

customer_reviews.title: A must have for all kitchens!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic set of high quality saucepans. Heavy gauge stainless steel (builds muscles) with good quality lids.
customer_reviews.author: Maxine Turner

customer_reviews.title: Great product wish I had bought them sooner
customer_reviews.text: Well made pans . They are heavy but conduct heat well. They do mark when boiling pasta or veg but clean up beautifully if you use a stainless steel cleaning product .
customer_reviews.author: trish Hammett

customer_reviews.title: The best saucepans I have owned
customer_reviews.text: The best saucepans I have owned. Have bought various saucepans over the years and these are outstanding. Hopefully will last a lifetime. Come out sparkling from the dishwater, and do not let out a lot of steam, so cooking is quicker.
customer_reviews.author: Joan Burt

customer_reviews.title: super quality
customer_reviews.text: May look expensive but these are the best pans we've ever had - superb quality - it reaslly is true - you get what you pay for - delighted
customer_reviews.author: stevethered

customer_reviews.title: fantastic pans!
customer_reviews.text: i am so happy with these pans and after years of wanting a set i am pleased to report they are as good as i expected them to be. worth every single penny. 'you get what you pay for' is so true with the le creuset saucepan set.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Best pans you will ever buy.
customer_reviews.text: Best pans on the market, expensive but will last you a lifetime. When they are washed up or put In the dishwasher they come out like sparkling new. Some older people may find them a little heavy to handle but that's because they such high quality. I also have a set of the three none stick which are great for sauces etc.
customer_reviews.author: James H.

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love them
customer_reviews.text: love them - used now several times and work beautifully and clean up well too - albeit with a bit of limescale speckles showing after cooking veg in water, but I am in a hard water area - when the recommended special stainless steel cleaner arrives this should clean off - but it isn't a big thing
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: I love these pans
customer_reviews.text: I love these pans. They were a replacement for a great set of Jamie Oliver Tefal Pans. These however look more stylish. Very easy to keep looking as good as new.
customer_reviews.author: Maryren

customer_reviews.title: what a great buy - as previous buyers have stated heats up ...
customer_reviews.text: what a great buy - as previous buyers have stated heats up so fast and maintains its heat for a considerable time . Really well made product with superior finish inside and out .
customer_reviews.author: Bernie Harrild

customer_reviews.title: More than happy customer.
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with my purchase and what a discount. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Let them cool down before washing them as the base can change colour
customer_reviews.text: They look fantastic and they are incredibly good at conducting heat even on a low heat setting
customer_reviews.author: Paul Cotton

customer_reviews.title: recipient extremely pleased with quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a present for friend: recipient extremely pleased with quality.
customer_reviews.author: Polamy

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic quality we are using them on a solid hob and there great. Slightly heavier than our last brand but the feel of quality is fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: hester

customer_reviews.title: Lovely Pans!
customer_reviews.text: I Love these pans. After trying to justify the price for several months I finally took the plunge, I'm so pleased I did. I've had them 4 months now & already I've added to the collection with a steamer and another 16cm pan. I haven't had any issues yet with the frying pan (as other reviews have mentioned the non stick coating peeling away) but i've only used it twice so far.
customer_reviews.author: S. M.

customer_reviews.title: We're really pleased with the quality of the saucepans
customer_reviews.text: We're really pleased with the quality of the saucepans, the only thing that we we're surprised at was the weight of the pans.
customer_reviews.author: Petecasso

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Quality product - worth every penny! These will be the last pans I buy - will last a lifetime.
customer_reviews.author: susan mcguinness

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant
customer_reviews.text: Easy to clean and non stick surface a breeze to cook on
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant!
customer_reviews.text: The quality of these saucepans are fantastic! I will not say any more except Le Creuset is on my list for permanent cookware....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I recommend
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality set of pots . I recommend .
customer_reviews.author: margarita sinitsin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent set of pans to which I've added more of the range. Heavy duty, professional look and feel.
customer_reviews.author: John Osborne

customer_reviews.title: Creuset 3-ply pan set
customer_reviews.text: while expensive, good value for money.. I've been using for over a year and still look like new. Clean really easily, dishwasher safe and great for use on stove or in the oven
customer_reviews.author: Joy

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality , work really well on our induction range, prompt delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality pans
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality pans. We've not been using them for long, but they cook things very evenly and don't take long to heat up.
customer_reviews.author: Alistair Clark

customer_reviews.title: ... my chap - he loves them and a really good price too -
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a christmas gift for my chap - he loves them and a really good price too - thanks
customer_reviews.author: Debthemanc

customer_reviews.title: Is that sad?! (I'd like some tooooo
customer_reviews.text: Bought as an Xmas present for my kitchen loving son who was very excited to get a set of saucepans. Is that sad?! (I'd like some tooooo!)
customer_reviews.author: valerie rush

customer_reviews.title: Superb
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic quality. Perfect for induction hob. Great value. Best price around for such quality cookware. Guaranteed for life. Vey happy.
customer_reviews.author: Haydn Chilcott

customer_reviews.title: Unbeatable
customer_reviews.text: What great pans for cooking with, very good quality, the handles do not get hot, they are excellent value for money
customer_reviews.author: Ant and Ken

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful saucepans
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful love them. I think they will last a lifetime.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ahh, they are beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I have had a frying pan for 6 months and just added this collection. Well worth the money for such exceptional quality
customer_reviews.author: Nike's Mum

customer_reviews.title: superb
customer_reviews.text: absolute quality, no non stick to worry about, definitely no worries about handles falling off. an excellent solid set of pans.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Stouses

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best cookware in the world, never had a single problem with any of these products.
customer_reviews.author: Gavin Donson

customer_reviews.title: pan set
customer_reviews.text: this pan set may not be cheapest but you can tell they are better quality some the cheaper ones on the market
customer_reviews.author: gmacinders

customer_reviews.title: Great pans
customer_reviews.text: Great pans. Altough they aren't very good for cooking eggs with.
customer_reviews.author: G Baker

customer_reviews.title: Cooking has never been this good
customer_reviews.text: They are what they say on the tin built to last and a pleasure to use will last as long as me I reckon. They look more an ornament than a utensil, beautifully made and design. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: sleepy eyes

customer_reviews.title: Pans to treat with care
customer_reviews.text: These Le Creuset pans are good to use, requiring low heat for simmering. Their dimensions are practical, not too wide but deep. They are quite heavy but well balanced. The lids can be used to half cover the pans if placed adjacent to the handle, not on top of the handle where they fall off. However, the manufacturer recommends simmering on lowest heat with the lids fully on. The other bother is that washing them requires care not to use abrasive pads other than non scratch, otherwise their surface will be immediately ruined. They can be put in the dishwasher. Quite costly but worth it.
customer_reviews.author: ArchCritic

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: We are so happy with our new set of pans. Cost a lot but we believe they are value for money. They heat up quickly and wash well. Great item
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. C. Whiteside

customer_reviews.title: Nice pans but not convinced they're worth the money
customer_reviews.text: These are well made pans and the lids fit perfectly meaning very little steam escapes. The bottom spreads the heat evenly and they work well on an induction hob. They look the business but I knocked off one star as I don't think they really represent good value for money as they are expensive compared to other pans.
customer_reviews.author: Richard G

customer_reviews.title: Present
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as a present. the old pans that these were replacing were well past their sell by date they were well received and were a great present, they are solid, well constructed and look stunning - if you like that sought of thing. the knowledge that that these come with a lifetime guarantee also provides peace of mind, unlike some lesser pans out there. great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice pans
customer_reviews.text: Been using the pans for six months and am very pleased. Heat distribution is even, and they are all a good size, the largest one works well not having a large jangle, which makes it easier to carry and saves space on the stove. Only issue is that the frying pan looks a little worn and has only been used a dozen times in six months, I am already see marks in the non stick coating, and we do not use metal utensils, which is a bit worrying.
customer_reviews.author: v chauhan

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic le creuset as usual. I am french and just love the quality of le creuset, But that 3ply serie is just above everything else. Bought them for my brother s wedding as well as for me, and it made him very happy as for any cooking person there are a must (despite the price, but as i always say "c est pour la vie").
customer_reviews.author: L. Laret

customer_reviews.title: Quality counts
customer_reviews.text: Looks good and definitely saves on fuel with a greater thermal efficiency ,They may not be cheap but they have the potential to actually pay for themselves in the fullness of time.
customer_reviews.author: alan bettey

customer_reviews.title: Happy lady!
customer_reviews.text: It's been a dream of mine to have these pans for ages and I finally convinced the husband they were worth the money in the long run as they have a lifetime guarantee. They are just beautiful, great quality, nice stacking so they take up half the space of my old pans, I am truly delighted.
customer_reviews.author: J A Platts

customer_reviews.title: Best saucepans in the world
customer_reviews.text: Everything about these saucepans exudes quality, from the design through to the choice of materials, fit, ergonomics of the handles, and lids. The lids won't retain water in the inside lip as most conventional lids do when used in a dishwasher. the handles on both the lids and the saucepans are riveted, made to last a lifetime. I purchased mine because of a hob change and needed saucepans which were suitable for ceramic induction. These saucepans will cook on anything. I've already ordered an omelette saucepan and a casserole. The best saucepans in the world? I think so!
customer_reviews.author: benbowbaggybum

customer_reviews.title: Amazing saucepans and deluvery
customer_reviews.text: Amazing set of saucepans. Heavy as expected from Le Creuset but with handles on both sides (not available in the UK) make them easier to use. Excellent customer and delivery service, arrived within a few days! Most highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: excellent quality but very heavy
customer_reviews.text: I bought the le creuset 3ply pans based on their good reputation They cook food so much quicker and evenly. However these are very heavy saucepans to hold so may not be suitable for elderly as gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Commuter Mum

customer_reviews.title: but not the best out there
customer_reviews.text: Quality pots, but not the best out there. Le Creuset are best in the enamel line.........These are meh.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Pans are Great But Finish isn't so great
customer_reviews.text: The pans arrived and were as I was expecting, having used them elsewhere before. What I wasn't expecting though was the stainless to start flaking off. It's happening on all 3 pans and I did read the care instructions before using. Am going to have to return them to see what can be done. Very disappointing given how much they cost.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Holden

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Have been using these for several months now and wished I bought them sooner. Yes they are expensive but they are definitely the best pans I've ever used. They are a joy to use and very easy to clean. I've used several different pans over the last 30 years and none have been as good as these.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna Mattock

customer_reviews.title: Saucepans are dissappointing
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set expecting high quality, but have been sadly disappointed. Everything sticks to the sauce pans & they are extremely difficult to wash. Dissappointed with this order.
customer_reviews.author: MRS CHANTEL SMITH

customer_reviews.title: Perfect pans
customer_reviews.text: Christmas Present to Self 😊 great price in sales. Researched a lot before buying and decided on these. Brilliant in all ways. Picture shows them stacked which is perfect for drawers in kitchen. Lifetime Guarantee too. Wish I’d bought them years ago
customer_reviews.author: Em Mc

customer_reviews.title: Robust, stylish and two handles per pan
customer_reviews.text: Le Creuset pans are superbly designed and given their sturdiness and weight the second handle is very useful to spread the load. We use these on an induction hob and they disipate the heat across the pan quickly and evenly. A fabulous addition to the kitchen
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Greenyer

customer_reviews.title: Simply the best
customer_reviews.text: These "are simply the best" bought for a gift, this is a great deal, from personal use these pots are indestructible and I have burnt black food which bleach off leaving no ill effects on pots, yes they are dearer however you will never need to replace them my pots are 15 years old and as good as new.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Stannage

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality and value
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant to cook with - only ever need low or medium settings. Looks great and of professional standard. Just ensure you read how to use and care for these (different from others pans)
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Amazing pots, defo worth paying the extra amount. It'd an investment I replace my pots every 10 years or so. Highly recommended. I was lucky enough to get them in the sale for 300.
customer_reviews.author: Mr.V

customer_reviews.title: Superb! Love mine 😍
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing! Love love love them! So easy to clean even when things feel like they’ve stuck like lentil soup etc quick soak for 2 minutes and it just wipes clean! Excellent value
customer_reviews.author: Carol G

customer_reviews.title: Best Saucepans ever
customer_reviews.text: These are the best saucepans I have ever had they're not as heavy as Le Creuset normally are which is great for me as I can't lift heavy weights and they are expensive but oh so well worth it. They go in the dishwasher, oven everything - couldn't wish for anything better and will definitely out live me
customer_reviews.author: Mel F

customer_reviews.title: As good as they get.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has had this set for several years, and I have long admired them for their outstanding durability and ease of use/washing. Their outstanding heat retention and distribution means that I use lower gas/electricity settings, and food does not stick. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Hoverstop

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 sets as presents for young couples. Lifetime guarantee beats all other manufacturers. I have a set that is 20yrs old and looks good as new.
customer_reviews.author: Joop

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic quality pans.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely fantastic pans. A dream to use. So easy to clean. Love them and wish I'd invested in some years ago!
customer_reviews.author: Squirell

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality, spreads and is great to use. heat evenly across the whole pan
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Peter A. G. Dawson

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Not cheap, but the quality of these pans is fantastic. After buying a cheap pan set and soon regretting it, we decided to splash out and invest in something a bit more solid. I absolutely love these and, six months later and after plenty of use, they still look and feel like new. The only thing I would say is that they're quite heavy, so anyone who has difficulty lifting things might find that a problem.
customer_reviews.author: a reader

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: A little disappointing for the price. The stainless steel inside has started to discolour after only a couple of months.
customer_reviews.author: P

customer_reviews.title: Appreciated
customer_reviews.text: These were bought as a gift- my chef son is very pleased with them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely beautiful set of saucepans with a really nice finish
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely beautiful set of saucepans with a really nice finish. The pans have volume measurements printed on the inside which is very useful. I would probably prefer the lids to be glass rather than stainless steel, but that is a minor complaint and doesn't detract from what is a great product. I'm sure these pans will last a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: MISS

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to your kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Total beautiful set of pans, so very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Dionne Burgoyne

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, but very heavy
customer_reviews.text: These are a great investment if you want quality pans. They are well made and conduct heat well. Only watch out is they are very heavy. The large pan full of water requires a little strength to lift and drain!
customer_reviews.author: Mags19

customer_reviews.title: Love at first sight
customer_reviews.text: These Le Creuset saucepans look so good and are so well made that I'm pretty much in love with them. My only slight niggle is that, in the instructions, it says, 'The 3-ply construction of the pans means you do not need to cook on high heat settings. Only medium to low heat is needed for most cooking.' They don't say you can't use high heat but they seem to be trying to discourage it, which means it takes a little longer to cook some things.
customer_reviews.author: RBR44

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not cheap, but solid. Never had Teflon that lasts, so gone back from Circulon to plain pans again.
customer_reviews.author: Peril

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality pots
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality pots. Really easy to clean and retains taste. Vegetables cook quickly and taste really nice. Make sure you use medium to low heat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Shiny and I like the long handles compared to the Fissler pans
customer_reviews.text: Quality product. Shiny and I like the long handles compared to the Fissler pans. Easily stacked to save cupboard space.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Ee

customer_reviews.title: Easy to manoeuvre  when full due to the handle opposite the main handle.
customer_reviews.text: Lovely pans, will last a lifetime , can be dishwashed.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs L Liversidge

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect, but for the shine
customer_reviews.text: Bought these last year to use in my holiday let. They have held up extremely well and the sizes are about right for cooking for 2-4 people. I wish they weren't shiny, as the shine is hard to keep up, but otherwise they are excellent pans.
customer_reviews.author: LOL

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality and design
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality and design. Really pleasant to use. Set feels really substantial and durable. Worth the not inconsiderable amount of money.
customer_reviews.author: mark4

product_meta.title: Le Creuset 3-Ply Stainless Steel Saucepan Set - Silver, 5 Pieces
product_meta.description: The Le Creuset three ply Stainless Steel range is made using the multi layering technology where stainless steel and aluminium are bonded together to form the special three ply material. A core of aluminium is sandwiched between two layers of premium grade stainless steel cleverly combining the cooking benefits of both materials. The aluminium stretches from base to rim, meaning heat spreads evenly and gently throughout the entire pan - not just the base. Professional style cast handles are attached with stainless steel rivets, secure fixing and the addition of helper handles makes lifting easier. Close fitting lids retain moisture and heat for efficient and nutritious cooking in the casserole, other thoughtful touches include capacity markings and an all round pouring rim. Suitable for use on all hob types including induction, oven and grill safe.
feature_bullets: Set consists of 3 pots (18/20/24 cm), 1 roasting pot (20 cm) and 1 professional pot (16 cm)
Oven safe: To 220 degrees Celsius/Gas Mark 7
